StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary: Aspiring data analytics seeking an opportunity in order to leverage my data analytics skills towards making business decision.Knowledge of Python, SQL, Tableau, Machine Learning

PositionHistory.Title: Data Analyst
PositionHistory.Description: Working on the data sets for gaining insights into the datasets. Projects done- Objective-Car Price Prediction. Achievements-Performed the EDA on the datasets provided, dealt with the missing values, developed the predictive model with parameter tuning. Key skills-Python, Data Visualization, Linear Regression, Decision Tree. Objective- Exploratory Data Analysis on Titanic Data. Achievements-Performed the exploratory data analysis to understand the various insights using data visualization tools like matplotlib, seaborn. Key skills-Python, Data Visualization tools

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 46% of this job

PositionHistory.Title: Engineer
PositionHistory.Description:
https://freesearch.naukri.com/preview/printResume?uname=145 35846181c2d5e0c1b4a550f504e1c6&sid=3810263223&AT=1580666727 2/2/20 19'06
Worked in coordination with the sales and engineering team and prepared the competitor's data specifying the features of the different bus trunking ranges. Studying the customer's database and analyzing the prospective region of sales and the customer's response to C&S products as compared to competitor's products. Interacting with dealers and gathering information about the market trends. Skills acquired-market research, understanding customer requirements, the latest advancement in technology.

PositionHistory.Title: Research Analyst
PositionHistory.Description: Creating the database of customers and bifurcating them as existing, potential and AMC(Annual Maintenance Contract) customer as per guidelines provided by Dassault Systems. Analyzing the database and making insights about potential customers and arranging technical meetings on the basis of their requirements. Preparing quarterly reports of sales and visualizing the reports through pie charts, line charts, etc.

School.SchoolName: Raj Kumar Goel Institute of Technology

Degree.Comments: UG: B.Tech/B.E. (Mechanical) from Raj Kumar Goel Institute of Technology in 2016
